imdb.plot outline: Jazz & Blues TV is an internet based, HD on-demand TV service, dedicated to showcasing the best contemporary Jazz, Blues, Soul, RnB, Latin & Gospel artists from around the world. This is another exiting step and direction for the DJ Central production team as Jazz & Blues will be going to production from the 20th July, the show will feature jazz, blues and soul artists from all over the world.
imdb.title: Jazz and Blues TV
plot: Jazz & Blues TV is an internet based, HD on-demand TV service, dedicated to showcasing the best contemporary Jazz, Blues, Soul, RnB, Latin & Gospel artists from around the world.
